title: Life Wheel
subtitle: Rate different areas of your life and set goals for your future.
description: Rate different areas of your life and set goals for each area.

editor.title: Edit Areas
editor.subtitle: Tap on an area to edit or select directly in the life wheel.

insights.title: Insights & Analysis
insights.needsAttention: Rating of {{value}}/10 indicates room for improvement
insights.noInsights: No special insights available. Rate more areas to gain insights.
insights.nextStepsDescription: Use your insights from the Life Wheel to plan concrete steps for improving your life situation with the CLEAR Method.

alerts.savedSuccess: Your changes have been successfully saved.
alerts.saveError: An error occurred while saving. Please try again.
alerts.saveBeforeContinue: Would you like to save your changes before continuing?

confirmations.deleteArea: Do you really want to delete this life area?
confirmations.resetWheel: Do you really want to reset the Life Wheel? All ratings will be set to 1.

modal.subtitle: Edit your values
modal.improvementNeeded: You want to improve by {{difference}} points
modal.satisfied: You are satisfied with the current state
modal.overachieving: You already exceed your target expectations
modal.notesPlaceholder: What is important to you in this area? What steps do you want to take?
